name: Wrapped in Radiance Rose Glow Lip Treatment & Eye Balm Duo
about: What it is:An eye and lip duo for an instant under-eye wakeup and hydrated, plumper-looking lips..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Line and Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Puffiness.Ingredient Callouts:These products are cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This Rose Glow + Get It duo features bestselling eye balm for an instant under-eye wakeup call and its lip-lovin’ BFF..This Set Contains:- 0.28 oz/ 8 mL Rose Glow + Get It Hydrating Peptide Lip Treatment.Clean at Sephora

Fluorphlogopite, Oleth-20, Glycerin, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Fruit Extract, Caffeine, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Lactic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, how_to_use: Our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.

reviews.review_text: oth products are lightweight, effective, and perfect for daily use, leaving you feeling fresh and glowing. Their portable design makes them ideal for on-the-go radiance. A must-have duo, earning 5/5 for its multitasking brilliance and luxurious feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Yes yes !!! both great products and had a super good price. I couldn’t pass it up.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my morning routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoying to put this balm under my eyes.It gives me refreshing glow. I really like lip glow too.It is so moisturizing and rich. I even repurchased it during sale time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this set. the eye balm is like an actual balm so i take it with me to touch up under my eyes thru out the day.   I alsk use it under my eyes with no makeup and will still layer a cream on top of it. i'm sure it can be worn alone, but it seems a little too light for my eyes, but I still absolutely love it. doenst causes creasing or piling.  The gloss changes color on and becomes more of a rosy tint. Absolutely, adore it, very hydrated lips. This is like the perfect set to give as a gift. Especially for someone who's traveling.
